item.title: Colophon
item.description:
🍁 Colophon

This site was made using the following:

  • Framework: Hugo
  • Styling: PaperCSS + additional custom styling
  • Writing: VS Code, iA Writer
  • Hosting: Netlify — my first time using cloud hosting!
  • Version Control: GitHub

Curious? You can check out the repo here.

🔡 Fonts

  • Site Name Font: Diary Autumn
  • Body Font: default PaperCSS font

🎨 Graphics & Icons

  • Papercut Autumn Leaf pattern background: Design Bundles
  • Paper pattern background (EP Natural White): Subtle Patterns
  • Favicon: Made with Procreate
  • Autumn Leaf Border: Also made with Procreate — CSS flips the same image for the bottom
  • Social Media Icons: Font Awesome (except Replit and Cara)
  • Replit Icon: From Replit Brand Kit → converted to SVG
  • Cara Icon: From Cara Logos → converted to SVG

👩🏻‍💻 Do I have to include these, too?

  • 💻 MacBook Air M4 (2025) 15"
  • 🎨📱 iPad Air M3 (2025) 13"

🤖 A Note on AI & Assistance

Some of the layout, code, and troubleshooting were assisted by Ai-chan (my friendly AI assistant a.k.a. ChatGPT), especially as I learned frameworks like Tailwind CSS and Hugo’s templating system. I review everything, tweak it, test it locally, and learn as I go.
